Other online resources
There are so many online resources about APIs, but here are my two favorite ones:
The API Developer Weekly Newsletter (https://apideveloperweekly.com/) is the best
way to know what happens in the API world and to discover new sources of infor-
mation about APIs.
The Web API Events website (https://webapi.events/) will keep you updated
about upcoming API conferences.
